items.title: BofA Cuts Qualcomm (QCOM) PT to $200, Retains ‘Buy’ on IoT, Auto Growth
items.description: QUALCOMM Incorporated (NASDAQ:QCOM) is also on the list of 10 undervalued blue chip stocks analysts recommend for smart investing. On June 17, Bank of America (BofA) adjusted its price target for Qualcomm from $245 to $200. The firm maintained a “Buy” rating for the stock. According to BofA analysts, the smartphone market has peaked. And […]
